body.html:
Success continues here, {{ personalization_token('contact.firstname', 'Friend') }}!

 

The National Board Certified Health & Wellness Coach (NBC-HWC) credential is the gold standard in health coaching. Passing the NBHWC board exam opens doors to top career opportunities.

 

Pathway graduates don't just pass the exam—they excel. With our evidence-based curriculum and hands-on training, our students are thoroughly prepared to succeed on exam day and continue thriving in their coaching careers.

A Learning Experience That Delivers Results

Your success as a National Board Certified Health & Wellness Coach starts with a program that's designed for HCI graduates like you:

 

👉 Practical Skills, Proven Results
Pathway combines evidence-based learning with hands-on experience. Every class, module, and coaching lab is focused on helping you apply what you learn in real-life coaching scenarios.

 

⭐️ Confidence on Exam Day
Our students don’t “cram” for the NBHWC exam—they’re prepared. From day one, Pathway helps you master core competencies and build the confidence to excel.

 

🏆 Accelerated, Yet Flexible
In just 12 weeks, you’ll complete the Pathway Program while balancing your existing commitments. It’s the perfect fast-track to board certification.

Your Future as a Board-Certified Coach
Pathway doesn’t just prepare you for an exam; it empowers you for a thriving career and personal growth. You’ll graduate with the skills, confidence, and credibility to enhance the lasting and meaningful impact you make in the lives of your clients.

 

Class starts Monday, January 13th—I hope to see you there!

We didn’t just learn. We transformed.

Now it’s your turn.

Are you ready to level up your coaching career in a meaningful way? Meet Christina Putnam, a former ICU nurse whose journey might look familiar if you're feeling called to make a bigger impact in healthcare.

Why Christina Made the Leap

After years in the ICU, Christina realized many of her patients’ chronic conditions could have been prevented with the right support earlier on. She wanted to make a bigger impact outside the hospital walls.

Her Pathway Experience

Christina chose the Pathway Program for its evidence-based curriculum, exceptional instructors, and the opportunity to earn National Board Certification. “It was the obvious choice for someone serious about making a difference,” she says.

Life After Pathway

Today, Christina runs Dynami Health and Wellness Coaching, helping clients nationwide transform their lives. Her favorite part? Guiding people to find their inner strength and overcome challenges they once thought impossible.

This can be your reality, too.

 

From healthcare and digital health startups to corporate wellness programs and hospitals, the need for coaches and the vast skills you’ll learn inside the Pathway program is expanding rapidly.

body.html:
Your Transformation Starts Now

 

We've helped thousands of people turn their passion for helping others into a thrilling, purpose-driven career. And right now? The door is open for you to step into your next chapter.


Why choose our Become a Health & Life Coach program? Here's what makes us different:


🌟 Created by Coaches, for Coaches – Our team has walked the path you're about to begin, transforming their own lives and now dedicated to helping you do the same.


💪 Dual Health & Life Coaching Certification – Recognized by Forbes as the top program that gives you the most comprehensive training possible.


🏆 ICF Accreditation – Bringing you industry-leading credentials that open doors and build instant credibility.


🚀 Proven Business Launch Training – We don't just teach coaching. We teach you how to build a thriving practice that feels like a calling, not a job.


⏱️ Complete in Just 6 Months – From where you are now to fully certified and ready to transform lives.


❤️ Profound Personal Transformation – This isn't just about changing careers. It's about discovering who you're meant to be.


This is more than a program. It's your pathway to a life that feels authentically, excitingly you.
Got questions? Schedule a quick call and let's map out your journey together.

Live Coaching Demo

Monday, January 6, 9 am PT / 12 pm ET

 

Peek behind the scenes of a real coaching session with HCI Co-Founder Carey Peters. Watch as she reveals the simple coaching formula that creates powerful client transformations.


By the end of this demo, you'll walk away feeling fired up, inspired, and thinking, "I can totally do this!"


Can’t make the live session? No worries! We’ll send a recording of the Live Coaching Demo the day after.
